english: Fit the tail assembly to the fuselage .
chinese: 把装配好的机尾安装到机身上。

english: Lighting fixture must be installed at once .
chinese: 必须立即安装照明设备。

english: The machine rests on a bed of concrete .
chinese: 机器安装在混凝土基座上。

english: The building was equipped with escalator .
chinese: 那大楼安装了自动扶梯。

english: The slave unit is located at the ground stations .
chinese: 附属装置安装在地面台。
安装造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: At last he began to assemble his safety razor .
chinese: 最后他开始安装安全刮脸刀。

english: The analyser is suitable for fields installation .
chinese: 这个分析仪适于室外安装。

english: We are having a new shower put in .
chinese: 我们正在安装新的淋浴器。

english: Temporary catwalks were used in the stay erection .
chinese: 安装拉索时设置了临时脚手。

english: Position the aerial for the best reception .
chinese: 把天线安装在接收效果最好的位置上。

english: Utility companies could install and maintain them .
chinese: 公用事业公司可以安装并保养它们。

english: Each succeeding fabricated box is erected on trolleys .
chinese: 每段预拼的箱梁安装在小平车上。

english: An equatorial mounting of the camera has a great advantage .
chinese: 将照相机赤道式安装很有利。

english: We put new central heating in when we moved here .
chinese: 我们搬到这儿的时候安装了集中供暖设备。
